Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Smith \& Dunst Barbering

Well-lit by overhead chandeliers of simple construction, this barber shop is outfitted with large mirrors on the western wall and a display case filled with innumerable sharp instruments and sundry tools to the east. Additional storage cabinets are set beneath the mirrors and provide a work surface to arrange any tools that might be in use. The wooden floor is swept clean and is pale in color, showing signs of frequent sweeping and washing. Three simple chairs sit facing the mirrors while a long couch in muted colors occupies the northern wall. Windows flanking the door to the south display small specimen jars filled with items.

Well-lit by overhead chandeliers of simple construction, this barber shop is outfitted with large mirrors on the western wall and a display case filled with innumerable sharp instruments and sundry tools to the east. Three simple chairs sit facing the mirrors while a long couch in muted colors occupies the northern wall. Windows flanking the door to the south display small specimen jars filled with items.

Well-lit by overhead chandeliers of simple construction, this barber shop is outfitted with large mirrors on the western wall and a display case filled with innumerable sharp instruments and sundry tools to the east. Additional storage cabinets are set beneath the mirrors and provide a work surface to arrange any tools that might be in use. The wooden floor is swept clean and is pale in color, showing signs of frequent sweeping and washing. Three simple wooden chairs sit facing the mirrors while a long couch in muted colors occupies the northern wall. Windows flanking the door to the south display small specimen jars filled with items.
a glass pane door leading south
A small door with a brass bell hung above it. The words "Smith and Dunst" have been painted on it in swirling script. $(parent-desc)
You enter through the door of the shop. A musical ring announces your arrival.
enters through the door, {$(actor.base:pronoun) |$(actor.base:pronoun)} is announced by a musical ring.
exits through the door. A musical ring announces the departure.
hanging bell
A small brass bell fixed above the doorway; it gives a musical ring whenever someone leaves or enters.
pair of simple chandeliers
More utilitarian than beautiful, these chandeliers fill the room with light.
The floor of the dim room is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths. The floor is warped and a bit unevenly laid.
The floor of the dim room is made from smooth wooden planks, of various widths. The floor is warped and a bit unevenly laid.
jar filled with vibrant red blood

A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar with some short, curly black hairs. This jar is filled with vibrant red blood, clearly fresh from a recent letting.
jar containing a shard of blood-stained bone

A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a jar of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. This jar contains a jagged shard of broken, bloodied bone.
jar containing some short, curly black hairs

A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. This one contains a large amount of freshly shaven, curly black hair.
jar of writhing leeches

A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. This jar is filled with wriggling, writhing leeches.
jar of extracted teeth

A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. This jar contains a number of extracted teeth in various stages of decay.
number of specimen jars displayed in the windows

A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs.
the first mirror
One of three large mirrors hanging on the western wall. The reflection in the warped glass shows your reflection;
One of three large mirrors hanging on the western wall. The reflection in the warped glass shows your reflection;
the second mirror
One of three large mirrors hanging on the western wall. The reflection in the warped glass shows your reflection;
One of three large mirrors hanging on the western wall. The reflection in the warped glass shows your reflection;
the third mirror
One of three large mirrors hanging on the western wall. The reflection in the warped glass shows your reflection;
One of three large mirrors hanging on the western wall. The reflection in the warped glass shows your reflection;
the eastern wall

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of dark, unpainted oak posts (the studs) and a few diagonal arch-braces, joined with mortises and pegs, and all somewhat less than perfectly flat and square. Few of the studs are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. The arch-braces rise from some of the larger posts, and curve slightly 'inward' as they rise to support the ceiling beams. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, whitewashed plaster, laid over laths or wattle-work covered with clay mixed with horse-hair. These panels are recessed about half an inch beyond the surrounding wooden framing. The wall is about eight feet high.
The half-timbered eastern wall of this dark room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.
The eastern side of this dark room seems to be a wall, built of wood and plaster.
The half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.
the northern wall

The close-studded, half-timbered northern wall is constructed of dark, unpainted oak posts (the studs) and a few diagonal arch-braces, joined with mortises and pegs, and all somewhat less than perfectly flat and square. Few of the studs are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. The arch-braces rise from some of the larger posts, and curve slightly 'inward' as they rise to support the ceiling beams. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, whitewashed plaster, laid over laths or wattle-work covered with clay mixed with horse-hair. These panels are recessed about half an inch beyond the surrounding wooden framing. The wall is about eight feet high.
The half-timbered northern wall of this dark room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered northern wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered northern wall is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.
The northern side of this dark room seems to be a wall, built of wood and plaster.
The half-timbered northern wall of this dim room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered southern wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster. Two mirrors are fixed on the wall near each other.

The half-timbered western wall of this dark room is constructed of wooden posts and diagonal braces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough plaster. There are two mirrors on it. Your reflection can be seen somewhat on them.

The close-studded, half-timbered western wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered western wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered southern wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster. Two mirrors are fixed on the wall near each other.
The western side of this dark room seems to be a wall, built of wood and plaster. Someone there is looking at you.
the left window

One of the windows flanking the door. The frame is thin and old, and the glass is subtly warped in places. A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. Through the window:
the right window

One of the windows flanking the door. The frame is thin and old, and the glass is subtly warped in places. A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. Through the window:
the windows flanking the door

The windows flanking the door. The frame is thin and old, and the glass is subtly warped in places. A number of specimen jars are displayed in the windows to be seen from the street as a form of simple advertising. You notice a jar of teeth, a small jar of leeches, a vial of fresh blood, a shard of bone in a small jar and a jar filled with some short, curly black hairs. Through the windows:

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ A short balding man pauses \{ just before pulling a tooth \| midstream while lancing a boil \| moments before setting a broken arm \| halfway through shaving a face \| as he gives a haircut \| just seconds before performing a bloodletting \} and turns to a portly bald man, "Hey Maurice! \{I have a few jokes about unemployed people, but none of them work! \| How do you make holy water? You boil the hell out of it! \| I lost my job at the bank on my very first day. A woman asked me to check her balance, so I pushed her over! \| Did you hear about the guy whose whole left side was cut off? He's all right now! \| What do you call a bee that can't make up its mind? A maybe! \} Hahahah!" \| A portly bald man waddles around the room \{ dusting \| sweeping \| mopping \| polishing instruments \| tidying up \} before turning toward a short balding man and calling, "Hey Paul, didja hear \{ about the crook who stole a calendar? He got twelve months! \| about the semi-colon that broke the law? He was given two consecutive sentences! \| about the Italian chef? He pasta way! \| that the price of duck feathers has risen? So now even down is up! \| about the stonemason's son? He was a chip off the old block! \} Bahaha!!" \| A garbled grunt can be heard as a short balding man yanks a rotting tooth from the mouth of an elderly man who quickly doubles over after the procedure is done. \| A portly bald man smiles pleasedly at himself in the mirror as he finishes a simple haircut and sends the customer on his way. \}

X[S] \{ A short balding man pauses \{ just before pulling a tooth \| midstream while lancing a boil \| moments before setting a broken arm \| halfway through shaving a face \| as he gives a haircut \| just seconds before performing a bloodletting \} and turns to a portly bald man, "Hey Maurice! \{I have a few jokes about unemployed people, but none of them work! \| How do you make holy water? You boil the hell out of it! \| I lost my job at the bank on my very first day. A woman asked me to check her balance, so I pushed her over! \| Did you hear about the guy whose whole left side was cut off? He's all right now! \| What do you call a bee that can't make up its mind? A maybe! \} Hahahah!" \| A portly bald man waddles around the room \{ dusting \| sweeping \| mopping \| polishing instruments \| tidying up \} before turning toward a short balding man and calling, "Hey Paul, didja hear \{ about the crook who stole a calendar? He got twelve months! \| about the semi-colon that broke the law? He was given two consecutive sentences! \| about the Italian chef? He pasta way! \| that the price of duck feathers has risen? So now even down is up! \| about the stonemason's son? He was a chip off the old block! \} Bahaha!!" \| A garbled grunt can be heard as a short balding man yanks a rotting tooth from the mouth of an elderly man who quickly doubles over after the procedure is done. \| A portly bald man smiles pleasedly at himself in the mirror as he finishes a simple haircut and sends the customer on his way. \}
